title: Privacy policy | Puzzicle
content:
Puzzicle is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy ("Policy") is designed to help you understand how we collect, use, and safeguard the information you provide to us and to assist you in making informed decisions when using our website and services.

Collection of Information

We collect the answers to quizzes only during the Zoom session. This is NOT personally identifiable information. And we do NOT retain even this non-personally identifiable information after the Zoom session.

We do not collect any personally identifiable information. As such, we cannot retain, share or do anything with information we do not collect.

We do not collect any personally identifiable information. As such, we cannot retain, share or do anything with information we do not collect. In that regard, there is no data to access for any customer.

Back To Home
